verbose_text: Previous research has indicated that fibroblast growth factor 2 (FGF2) inhibits BMP9 induced osteogenic differentiation by blocking BMP9 induced Smad signaling and subsequently reducing Smad dependent upregulation of ALK1 and ALK2 in MSCs.
evidence: Smad signaling and subsequently reducing Smad-dependent upregulation of ALK1 and ALK2
